channel.title: Re:Connect Show with High Eight: Breakbeat and nuskool breaks for the electronic music fan.
channel.description: Breakbeat show archive from NSB Radio with DJ High Eight.
channel.itunes:author: High Eight
channel.itunes:subtitle: 2-hour breakbeat show with ReConnect records artist and DJ High Eight. Breakbeat, electro and beyond, from upfront tunes to nuskool classics. Catch the live show 1st and 3rd Wednesdays on www.nsbradio.co.uk, and find out more information on www.higheight.
channel.itunes:summary: 2-hour breakbeat show with ReConnect records artist and DJ High Eight. Breakbeat, electro and beyond, from upfront tunes to nuskool classics. Catch the live show 1st and 3rd Wednesdays on www.nsbradio.co.uk, and find out more information on www.higheight.com.

item.title: Re:Connect Show Vs Boomslang Beats 20th May 2009
item.description: ReConnect Show VS Boomslang Beats Relaunch Show with High Eight and That Girl DJ 20th May 2009. We're finally back on air after an extended absence thanks to our ISP. Were back with another jam packed with breaks and beats old and new. Featuring tracks from the likes of Rennie Pilgrem, Mesmer, Rudenko, The Prodigy, Calvin Harris, That Girl DJ and many more!

item.title: Armitage Skanks Cover Show 26th April 2008
item.description: I did a Saturday morning cover show for the Armitage Skanks crew, and dropped some chilled, more laid back tunes for 2 hours. Includes tracks from Groove Armada, Jamie Lidell, David Holmes, Mr Scruff, A Skillz, Bugz In The Attic, and many more.
item.author: neil@higheight.com (High Eight)
